DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics BIRT 2584 XX single rise oral dos 5 mg 700 mg polyethylene glycol 400 ( PEG 400 ) solution healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics BIRT 2584 XX Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject determine result screen Signed write informed consent accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) local legislation Age > =18 < =50 year BMI > =18.5 < =29.9 kg/m2 Any find medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate , electrocardiogram ) deviate normal clinical relevance Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunologic , haematological , oncological hormonal disorder Surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder neurological disorder Relevant history orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackouts Chronic relevant acute infection History allergy/hypersensitivity ( include drug allergy ) deem relevant trial judge investigator Intake drug long halflife ( > 24 hour ) ( < 1 month prior administration trial ) Use drug , might influence result trial , ( < 10 day prior study drug administration expect trial ) Participation another trial investigational drug ( < 2 month prior administration expect trial ) Smoker ( > 10 cigarette > 3 cigar > 3 pipes/day ) Alcohol abuse ( > 60 g/day ) Drug abuse Blood donation loss > 400 mL , < 1 month prior administration expect trial Clinically relevant laboratory abnormality Any ECG value outside reference range clinical relevance include , limited QRS interval > 110 m QT interval , Bazett correction ( QTcB ) > 450 m QT interval > 500 m Inability comply dietary regimen study centre Inability comply investigator 's instruction
